item_category: The HUAWEI MediaPad T5 is an eye-catching tablet with a premium, refined design. Its symmetrical metal body is crafted with care and is sleek and lightweight, enough to be conveniently portable and easy to hold. The HUAWEI MediaPad T5 comes with a stunning 10.1" display (1920 X 1200 resolution) that delivers excellent detail. The 16:10 aspect ratio makes it perfect for watching movies or TV shows and browsing websites. Dual speakers produce high-quality, robust audio for your favourite music.
review_title: Good value easy to use tablet
Slow. Crashes. Disconnects. Got a refund
review_text: The graphics on this tablet are amazing. I couldn't be happier. The perfect addition to go with my Huawei phone
I have found the tablet nice and enjoyable to use. Good battery life. Lovely sharp screen image.
I bought this for the technophobe wife and she has mastered reading her books and watching videos. very easy to set up and use
I perches this to replace an existing one this is perfect compared to the other one very please with the product
Brought as a gift for my mother who's buzzing with it great size easy to use can not be more pleased with purchase
I bought this tablet for my daughter and she absolutely loves it.
I bought this on impolse glad I did worth the money would recommend this .
I bought it for my 12 years old daughter its brilliant and she loves it
Absolutely amazing tablet 100% recommend people buy it

My dad always used to tell me "you get what you pay for" and unfortunately I paid for a low budget tablet and got a low quality product. Whilst aesthetically pleasing that's where it stops. I used it for 2 hours, the tablet disconnected and crashed frequently. Response times were also very slow and I became despondent quickly. Took it back to Argos for a refund. If you're after a budget tablet steer clear of this and go for a Lenovo if you cannot afford the extra for a decent mid range slate.
